citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility was unable to provide the inspector with a written plan for environmental enhancement. Dealers, exhibitors,
and research facilities must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement
adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be in accordance with the currently accepted
professional standards as cited in appropriate professional journals or reference guides, and as directed by the attending
veterinarian. This plan must be made available to APHIS upon request.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n
